source: Planck Public Data Release 3 (PR3): LFI 70 GHz all-sky map (HEALPix FITS). Source is ESA Planck Legacy Archive; mirror/download pages available at NASA/IPAC IRSA. Input FITS is not bundled.

source_files.notes: Large binary; track with Git LFS when publishing to GitHub. Input is excluded from this distribution; download from public sources listed in DATA_SOURCES.md.
